tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Akansha is very professional, My teeth was 90 degree rotated since childhood, she suggested me the possible treatment based on my age (RCT + Zirconia Cap or Braces) , although she told me not to choose the braces because of my age nearby 30 yrs. She explained me everything about the procedure. I am a kind of person who asks too much questions, but she clears all my doubts calmly. Even for the cap measurement and teeth shade matching she specially called lab person. Apart from that she gives proper appointment timing so that patient should not have to wait for long duration. She gave me some discount as well :)

Will surely recommend everyone to just visit there for any dental related problems

Thank You Very Much Dr Akansha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Firstly, I'd recommend anyone looking for any dental treatment to go to SmileFit Dental care. Dr. Akansha is very friendly, lets you know the root cause of your problem, explains everything clearly and the treatment is excellent. I had crooked front teeth and I wanted a painless and fast procedure as I had a time constraint. Dr. Akansha suggested a few alternatives and I chose to go with dental crowns. She was very considerate and helpful throughout the procedure. I finally have a good frontline after the treatment within 10 days. I'm very happy with the result and Dr.Akansha is always ready to help and I would definitely recommend you to go here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Metal Braces Fixing,Smile Design,Dental Implant Fixing,
review: Iam very satisfied with my treatment of braces .Got excellent results in few months ,still few months is left to complete the treatment but as if now got excellent result ..My misaligned tooth came in alignment which change my smile , got allot of confidence because of my good smile . Clinic is well equipped and all other specialists are also visiting in the clinic..All other doctors are well experienced . Dr Akansha is the one because of her we recommended to everyone ..She is very polite and friendly as well as professional..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had visited the Dental clinic for Ingrown tooth removal few months back and got it removed. I had concerns over the misaligned teeth and wanted to get Braces, Dr. Akanksha was very friendly and clarified all my queries and concerns. I got my braces 8 months back and I have been visiting the clinic every month for braces Adjustment. 
The best Dental Clinic in the Locality with lots of Happy Customers including me. 
Dr. Akanksha being very gentle and humble in nature, welcomes every patient with a smile and it is just comforting. Definitely would recommend this clinic for anyone visiting Dentist for the first time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Scaling / Polishing,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Composite tooth filling,
review: I visited Dr.Akansha Kapoor for tooth ache and was diagnosed I had to go for RCT as the cavity was way too deep, she ensured the same by taking a couple of X-Rays. She explains the issue at hand and also recommends the solution for a long run. I was really scared initially but the doctor made me so comfortable that I really felt this to be a pain less procedure, I liked the fact that the doctor personally called me to check if there was any issue / pain after the initial procedure was done. Prompt follow ups without any delays or waiting time.My husband as well has been treated by this doctor and he is also very happy with the services offered here.I personally recommend Dr.Akansha for any sort of dental issues.Kudos to her extreme patience and dedication.!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
After long research, I visited Dr. Akansha for RCT and it being my first experience for RCT I was quite scared to visit any dentist for that matter

Her professional way of treatment along with her ease of explanation of the issue and how is she treating it - just calmed me and all I had to do is follow the simple tips that she had suggested :)

Since then, she has become our family dentist and has treated my wife, my sister and my father so far.

It's not just the treatment but also the care and follow ups that she does during recovery - differs her from the rest.

No doubt we will be seeing her if we have any dental troubles and will highly recommend all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: I had been there for my mother's dental treatment. The doctor explained the problem to us in detail and advised the course of treatment and then laid out a clear plan of action. She completed the treatment in highly sophisticated manner and exactly as per the plan. I especially appreciate her caring nature and empathetic behaviour with the patients. The clinic is very neat and clean, well organised and I could see it getting sanitized after every patient. The doctor manages her appointments so efficiently that we never had to wait in the clinic. I am glad that I chose this clinic for my mothers treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited doctor for toothache issue and found out that it was a root canal case. along with that during examination it was found that 7 of my teeth had started developing cavity. For the tooth of root canal one, I had to get a tooth cap as well. Plus tooth cleaning too.Throughout the treatment, the doctor was very helpful in understanding the issue. Suggested, what needs to be done and carried out the procedure which lasted around 4-5 sittings. Per sitting took mostly half an hour. All sittings for treatment were totally hassle free and doctor made me feel comfortable by regularly asking for any pain or discomfort during treatment. Post treatment there's no issues so far. Highly satisfied and thankful for doctor's service. Will highly recommended everyone to avail the services.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,

I highly recommend the services as its very trustworthy with one's family members for any dental care services.

review: Visited doctor for my tooth pain in my 6th month of pregnancy. tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ******** ** * ********* ****** *** ****** *** **** **** ********* *********. The wisdom tooth extraction procedure went very smooth with no pain. Best part of the expertly done procedure was the post operative care taken, where there was no pain, no complications. 
There is a proper follow up with the patient on the healing process where clinic makes sures that if patient is having questions, doubts or any post operative issue then that is quickly answered and attended. 

Recommendation on this one is 10/10. 

If anyone looking for stress free , pain free and tension free tooth related issue to be resolved. Please visit this clinic.

Special Thanks to Dr. Akanksha who make sures end to end procedure goes smoothly and paitent is satisfied with the treatment.
